name: 2025 14th International Conference on Software and Computer Applications
content: Publication: The ISBN number assigned to ICSCA 2025 is 979-8-4007-1012-4 You are invited to submit manuscript to ICSCA 2025\. The accepted paper will be included into ICSCA 2025 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). We invites you to publish an extended version of ICSCA 2025 paper. Please make sure you have added at least 30% of a new contents. â–  Journal of Advances in Information Technology Indexing: ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, CNKI, etc. http://www.jait.us/
